description:
Visit https://www.squarespace.com/LTT and use offer code LTT for 10% off

Create your build at https://www.buildredux.com/linus

Sony has made a lot of cool products over the last few decades, and while the Vidimagic FP-60 CRT projector might not be impressive today, it had a lot going for it back in 1984. 

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1561763-i-can%E2%80%99t-believe-how-much-i-paid-for-this%E2%80%A6/

Sony Vidimagic FP 60 Indextron Video Projector repair: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ApuK6YAzuM

The Sony VidiMagic VCR - Video Projector Original Dealer Training Video 1984: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KKPv2kC-_rQ

Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

title: I Can’t Believe How Much I Paid For This…
